arm_group.description: Follow-up treatment and care in a intermediate care unit after discharge from hospital
Discharge from hospital to usual care as provided by the local health and social care (Verdal)
Discharge from hospital to usual care as provided by the local health and social care (Stjørdal)

brief_summary.textblock:
The main goal is to investigate the following topics:

        1. Can discharge via the Intermediate Care Unit in Stjørdal, compared to direct discharge
           to Verdal Municipality, be equally effective in preventing aggravation of disease and
           loss of function for patients over 60 years that have been hospitalized in Levanger
           hospital?

        2. Are the cost by discharge to the Intermediate Care Unit in Stjørdal, when the hospital
           is not located in the same Municipality, comparable to the cost by direct discharge to
           the Municipality of Verdal, for patients over 60 years that have been hospitalized in
           Levanger hospital?

        3. Which issues are considered important by patients and health personnel during
           discharge, arrival and follow up in the Municipality, to ensure an optimal interaction
           between the involved units.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Discharge Via an Intermediate Care Unit

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        Patients 60 years old or older from Stjørdal- or Verdal municipality,

          -  given consent,

          -  admitted from their home,

          -  diagnostics completed and necessary treatment started

          -  the patient need not less than 3-4 days institutionalization for
             treatment/rehabilitation/care

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with severe dementia

          -  Patients with severe disease who cannot give consent

          -  Patients with severe disease with short life expectancy (including severe cancer)

clinical_study.official_title: Can Discharge Via an Intermediate Care Unit Prevent Aggravation of Disease and Loss of Functionality, Without Increasing the Level of Cost? A Controlled Observational Study

overall_official.affiliation: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

oversight_info.authority: Norway:National Committee for Medical and Health Research Ethics

primary_outcome.description: Acute admission to hospital within 30 days from previous discharge

primary_outcome.measure: Use of local health care services

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
